source.635e0bb8:
import pandas as pd
from pandas_profiling import ProfileReport

# Read the Titanic training data into a pandas DataFrame
train_data = pd.read_csv('../input/titanic/train.csv')

# Now produce a profile report:
profile = ProfileReport(train_data, title="Pandas Profiling Report")
source.04f6fd10:
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore") # silence an iframe warning
source.b44461d2:
# and finally display the profile report
profile.to_notebook_iframe()

## Titanic: Exploratory data analysis in just one line of code with `pandas_profiling`
[pandas profiling](https://pypi.org/project/pandas-profiling/) is a simple way to perform your initial exploratory data analysis (EDA). It is very easy to use:
